name: A Small World (A_Sandwich)
description:
Note: This appears to work in chrome on itch.io but not in firefox. Sorry!

Also sometimes input keys appear to not get through the itch.io layer. I'm not sure what causes it to sometimes fail. Sorry if this is the case for you. I also provided a jar of the game if you want to play it locally.

Controls:

Move: W, A, S, D,

shoot: I, J, K, L. (Arrow keys work too, but suck in a web browser)
